ourStory.title: Our story
ourStory.body: Nur & Garden was born on the fertile lands of Samarkand. Each grain of rice is the patient gift of nature. We blend generational expertise with contemporary technology to deliver impeccable taste and enduring quality.

tradition.title: Tradition
tradition.description: Inspired by family heritage and culture.

mission.title: Our mission
paragraphs: Nur & Garden exists to share the elegance of Uzbek rice with the world. We cultivate longstanding relationships with farmers who treat the soil as a living legacy, not a resource to be exhausted.
Every batch that leaves our mill is a reflection of family craft. From seed selection to the final polish, we elevate humble grain into a refined culinary experience.
We believe that luxury should feel grounded. That is why Lazer rice is transparent in origin, respectful of nature and consistent in every kitchen.

items.title: Selective farming
items.description: Heritage seeds are planted in small lots so we can monitor water, nutrients and growth at every stage.

items.title: Slow maturation
items.description: Grains are sun-cured and husked in batches, preserving the natural oils that carry aroma and flavour.

items.title: Polished by artisans
items.description: Our millers work with hand-adjusted equipment, achieving the signature Lazer sheen without damaging the grain.

timeline.title: Family beginnings
timeline.description: Our founders in Fergana reintroduced traditional drying and polishing methods to keep rice aromatic.

timeline.title: Sustainable pledge
timeline.description: We converted our partner farms to water-efficient irrigation and chemical-free soil care.

timeline.title: Craft mill expansion
timeline.description: A dedicated polishing atelier opened, enabling limited batches with precision finishing.

timeline.title: Global launch
timeline.description: Lazer rice debuted internationally, keeping its boutique production scale and authentic story.

items.title: Traceable origin
items.description: Every lot is tagged to its micro-farm and harvest date, so partners know exactly where their rice begins.

items.title: Responsible supply
items.description: We invest in farmer training, irrigation technology and fair pricing to keep rural communities thriving.

items.title: Consistent quality
items.description: Multiple taste and texture tests are performed before packaging, ensuring Lazer cooks the same in every kitchen.

lazer.name: Lazer Rice
lazer.description: Premium Uzbek rice with crystal shine and balanced texture.

lazer.story: From the seed to the steamed platter, Lazer rice embodies the hospitality of Uzbekistan. Families in the Fergana Valley nurture the fields throughout the seasons, letting the grains develop slowly under generous sun. After harvest, the rice is husked in small batches, washed in pure mountain water and gently polished until each grain gleams.
lazer.longDescription: Because we preserve the natural oils and structure of the grain, Lazer rice remains fragrant, tender and resilient during cooking. It keeps a perfect shape, absorbs spices evenly and brings a subtle glossy finish to every plate — whether it’s a restaurant signature dish or a home celebration.
notes: Consistent texture for pilaf and steamed dishes
